articles.description: You will wonder how you lived before knowing it was this easy to switch between a Xbox console and PC.
articles.content:
If you've ever found it frustrating to move your Xbox controller over from your console to PC or a mobile device, this curiously hidden trick will likely save you a lot of time going forward.

articles.title: Apple accessory sale: iOS Camera Adapter $24, Space Gray Magic Trackpad 2 $136.50, more - 9to5Toys
